text: (Such as persevere) in fulfilling the commands of Allah and in bearing misfortune (in seeking their Lord's Countenance) in pursuit of their Lord's good pleasure (and are regular in prayer) and perform the five daily prayers (and spend of that which We bestow upon them) and give alms from that which We have given them (secretly) such that none knows of it except Allah (and openly) in front of people, (and overcome evil with good) they face evil speech with good speech. (Theirs) the reward of those who fit the description above in His saying: (But only men of understanding� and overcome evil with good) to these people (will be the sequel of the (heavenly) Home) i.e. Paradise.
